title: GE WR55X10942 Refrigerator Main Control Board
features: Genuine GE OEM authorized factory part number WR55X10942
This board will not work on GE refrigerator models that have a compressor inverter board
Fits with various GE brand models
description: A constant clicking from the motherboard indicates a bad board. A bad motherboard may show burnt marks or bad soldering joints from overheating on the front or back of the board. If the refrigerator lights dim when you get ice/water, or if the ice melts and refreezes are also signs of a bad motherboard. A hum and then a click a few seconds later from the compressor indicates a compressor or relay issue but not a motherboard problem.
General Electric WR55X10942 Refrigerator Main Control Board is common in GE, RCA, and Hotpoint brands. Installation instructions are included

title: Replacing the “Muthaboard”
How to Replace WR55X10942 Board for GE Branded Refrigerators
